categories.name: 主流叙事风格
categories.description: 常用的主流视频叙事风格

styles.name: 日系动漫风格
styles.prompt_keywords: anime style, japanese animation, big expressive eyes, detailed facial expressions, dynamic hair and clothing, bright color contrast, speed lines, effect glows, manga aesthetic
styles.description: 大眼睛角色设计，细腻的面部表情，动态的头发和服装褶皱，明亮的色彩对比，典型的日本动画美学，包含速度线和特效光晕

styles.name: 韩式唯美插画
styles.prompt_keywords: korean illustration style, soft pastel colors, delicate character features, dreamy lighting, fine texture details, warm color temperature, blurred background, manhwa aesthetic
styles.description: 柔和的色调，精致的人物五官，梦幻的光影效果，细腻的纹理质感，温暖的色温，朦胧的背景虚化

styles.name: 欧美卡通风格
styles.prompt_keywords: western cartoon style, exaggerated proportions, bold outlines, saturated colors, simplified shapes, strong action poses, comic book aesthetic
styles.description: 夸张的人物比例，粗线条轮廓，饱和度高的色彩，简化的形状设计，强烈的动作表现力

styles.name: 新海诚风格
styles.prompt_keywords: makoto shinkai style, hyper-realistic backgrounds, stunning sky rendering, dramatic lighting, detailed environmental atmosphere, cinematic composition, anime movie quality
styles.description: 超写实的背景细节，绚丽的天空渲染，强烈的光影对比，细腻的环境氛围，电影级的构图

styles.name: 皮克斯3D动画
styles.prompt_keywords: pixar 3d animation style, rounded character design, expressive faces, warm ambient lighting, detailed textures, cinematic depth of field, family-friendly aesthetic
styles.description: 圆润的角色造型，夸张但自然的表情动作，温暖的环境光照，细腻的材质纹理，电影级的景深效果

styles.name: 超写实3D渲染
styles.prompt_keywords: photorealistic 3d render, realistic human modeling, accurate skin textures, physically based lighting, high detail environments, cinematic post-processing, unreal engine quality
styles.description: 逼真的人物建模，真实的皮肤纹理，物理准确的光照系统，高精度的环境细节，电影级的后期效果

styles.name: 风格化3D卡通
styles.prompt_keywords: stylized 3d cartoon, simplified geometry, candy colors, soft edges, toy-like textures, exaggerated physics, playful aesthetic
styles.description: 简化的几何造型，鲜艳的糖果色彩，柔和的边缘处理，玩具般的质感，夸张的物理效果

styles.name: 电影摄影风格
styles.prompt_keywords: cinematic photography, widescreen composition, professional depth of field, cinema color grading, motion blur, professional lighting setup, film look
styles.description: 宽屏比例构图，专业的景深控制，电影级色彩调色，动态模糊效果，专业灯光布置

styles.name: 纪录片风格
styles.prompt_keywords: documentary style, handheld camera feel, natural lighting, unprocessed footage aesthetic, journalistic composition, raw and authentic
styles.description: 手持摄影的自然晃动感，真实的环境光，未经修饰的画面质感，新闻摄影构图

styles.name: 复古胶片风格
styles.prompt_keywords: vintage film photography, film grain texture, faded colors, light leaks, old photo scratches, nostalgic color temperature, analog aesthetic
styles.description: 胶片颗粒质感，褪色的色彩效果，轻微的漏光效果，老照片的划痕纹理，怀旧的色温

categories.name: 特色艺术风格
categories.description: 具有独特艺术表现力的风格

styles.name: 水彩童话风格
styles.prompt_keywords: watercolor illustration, transparent wash effects, soft color transitions, hand-painted irregular edges, paper texture, dreamy color palette, children's book style
styles.description: 透明水彩的晕染效果，柔和的色彩过渡，手绘的不规则边缘，纸张纹理质感，梦幻的色彩搭配

styles.name: 彩铅手绘风格

styles.description: 彩色铅笔的笔触纹理，柔和的色彩层次，素描的线条感，纸张的颗粒质感

styles.name: 扁平矢量插画

styles.name: 版画艺术风格

styles.name: 美式超英漫画

styles.description: 强烈的明暗对比，粗犷的线条，鲜艳的原色使用，动态的动作姿势，漫画书印刷效果

styles.name: 欧洲艺术漫画

styles.name: 四格条漫风格

usage_notes.prompt_construction: 建议将prompt_keywords直接加入到AI绘图提示词中
usage_notes.style_combination: 可以组合多个风格获得独特效果
usage_notes.settings_application: recommended_settings可根据具体AI工具调整使用
